welcome.title: 欢迎使用 Moneta!
welcome.description: Moneta 是为 MNA 持有者开发的 dApp。如果您之前从未使用过 Moneta，请先阅读我们的简要介绍。

whatIsSynthetix.title: 什么是 Moneta?
whatIsSynthetix.description: Moneta 是一个建立在 HSC 上的去中心化合成资产发行协议。这些合成的资产（Synths）来自于抵押 Moneta Network Token（MNA），且可以直接用 Moneta 交易所上的 Moneta 智能合约在彼此间直接交易。

whyStakeSnx.title: 为什么要抵押 MNA?
whyStakeSnx.description: MNA 持有人可以收到两种奖励。第一，持有人可以收到新增代币奖励，这些代币来自于通胀的货币政策。第二，Synth 的交易奖励，这些奖励来自于 Moneta 交易所的合成资产交易费。

howStakeSnx.title: MNA 持有人需要做什么？
howStakeSnx.description: 所有合成资产都由抵押的 MNA 来支撑其价值，抵押率现在为 800%。MNA 持有者需要自行管理自己的抵押率（包括销毁合成资产以增加抵押率，或铸造新的合成资产以降低抵押率），使其超过800%。做到这些，持有人即可领取每周奖励。

risks.title: 有什么风险？
risks.description: 所有 MNA 持有人在抵押时，都会产生一笔“债务”。一开始，债务是他们初始铸造的 sUSD 数量，接下来，债务将随着其他合成资产持有人的收益和损失而波动。当有人持有的合成资产增值时，那部分收益将按比例来自于所有 MNA 持有人的债务。每个持有人都必须付清他们的债务，才能解锁他们抵押的 MNA。

walletConnection.title: 请连接存有 MNA 的钱包以继续：

success.title: 选择钱包
success.subtitle: 请选择您要连接到 Moneta 的钱包

loading.connectInstructions: 请按照您设备上的指示解锁您的钱包。

error.title: 错误
error.subtitle: Moneta 不能访问您的钱包。

mint.title: 铸造
mint.description: 抵押 MNA 来铸造 sUSD

burn.title: 销毁
burn.description: 销毁 sUSD 来解锁抵押的 MNA

claim.title: 申领
claim.description: 申领 MNA 新增代币奖励和 Synth 交易奖励

action.title: 铸造
action.subtitle: 抵押您的 MNA 来铸造 sUSD。抵押产生的抵押率和债务记录，将使您赚取奖励。
action.instruction: 直接确认或手动输入您要铸造的数量：

action.title: 销毁
action.subtitle: 销毁 sUSD 来解锁您抵押的 MNA。这将增加您的抵押率，并减少您的债务，使您能转账未托管的 MNA。
action.instruction: 直接确认或手动输入您要销毁的数量：

action.title: 申领
action.subtitle: 如果您抵押了 MNA 并铸造了 sUSD，您就有资格获得两种奖励：MNA 新增代币奖励，和 moneta 产生的 Synth 交易奖励
action.tradingRewards: 您的 Synth 交易奖励：
action.stakingRewards: 您的 MNA 新增代币奖励：
action.note: 如果7天内不领取，你的奖励将会被回收到手续费池。

action.title: Track
action.subtitle: Track your debt over time, with charts via

action.title: 交易
action.subtitle: 交易您的合成资产和 sUSD。使用 moneta dApp 来交易所有 Synth 种类。

intro.title: 仓库：
intro.subtitle: moneta 将会把存在这里的 sUSD 卖出换成 ETH。您可以在排队中的任何时间取出您的 sUSD。最小存款为 50 sUSD。

staking.title: 领取您在抵押中的 MNA 新增代币奖励
staking.subtitle: 如果您抵押 MNA 并铸造了 sUSD，您就有资格领取 MNA 新增代币奖励，托管 2 周之后，您可以在这里领取。

tokenSale.title: 领取您在代币销售中托管的 MNA
tokenSale.subtitle: 如果您代币销售中的 MNA 仍在托管，您可以在这里领取。

locked.subtitle: First approve the Unipool contract to transfer your sETH UNI-V1 tokens for staking.

unlocked.subtitle: Here you can stake your UNI-V1 Liquidity Provider (LP) tokens, claim MNA rewards, or exit completely.

locked.subtitle: First approve the Unipool contract to transfer your sXAU UNI-V2 tokens for staking.

unlocked.subtitle: Here you can stake your UNI-V2 Liquidity Provider (LP) tokens, claim MNA rewards, or exit completely.

unlocked.subtitle: Here you can stake your iETH synths, claim MNA rewards, or exit completely.
unlocked.settle-info: You need to settle before being able to stake your iETH.

locked.subtitle: First approve the iBtcRewards contract to transfer your iBTC synths for staking.

unlocked.subtitle: Here you can stake your iBTC synths, claim MNA rewards, or exit completely.
unlocked.settle-info: You need to settle before being able to stake your iBTC.

locked.subtitle: First approve the sHOORewards contract to transfer your sHOO tokens for staking.

unlocked.subtitle: Here you can stake your sHOO tokens, claim MNA rewards, or exit completely.
unlocked.settle-info: You need to settle before being able to stake your sHOO.

locked.subtitle: First approve the iHOORewards contract to transfer your iHOO tokens for staking.

unlocked.subtitle: Here you can stake your iHOO tokens, claim MNA rewards, or exit completely.
unlocked.settle-info: You need to settle before being able to stake your iHOO.

locked.subtitle: First approve the sEthRewards contract to transfer your sETH synths for staking.

unlocked.subtitle: Here you can stake your sETH synths, claim MNA rewards, or exit completely.
unlocked.settle-info: You need to settle before being able to stake your sETH.

locked.subtitle: First approve the sBtcRewards contract to transfer your sBTC synths for staking.

unlocked.subtitle: Here you can stake your sBTC synths, claim MNA rewards, or exit completely.
unlocked.settle-info: You need to settle before being able to stake your sBTC.

curvepool.title: Curve Finance sUSD LP Token Rewards

locked.subtitle: First approve the Curvepool contract to transfer your Curve LP tokens for staking.

unlocked.subtitle: Here you can stake your Curve LP tokens, claim MNA rewards, or exit completely.

curvepoolSBTC.title: Curve Tokenised BTC LP Token Rewards

locked.subtitle: First approve the Curvepool contract to transfer your Curve LP tokens for staking.

unlocked.subtitle: Here you can stake your Curve LP tokens, claim BPT rewards, or exit completely.

locked.subtitle: First approve the Balancer Pool contract to transfer your BPT tokens for staking.

unlocked.subtitle: Here you can stake your Balancer (BPT) tokens, claim MNA rewards, or exit completely.

popup.title: Delegate wallet addresses
popup.description: Delegation enables a wallet to execute functions on behalf of another wallet: mint, burn, claim, and exchange, but not transfer.

input.label: Enter new wallet address to delegate:

transactionSettings.title: 设定 gas price
transactionSettings.subtitle: 调整下方的 gas price (GWEI) 来设置交易速度。

confirmation.title: 请确认转账
confirmation.subtitle: 请按照您 <1>walletType</1> 钱包上的提示来继续。

complete.subtitle: 您的转账已经被广播到Heco网络。您现在可以关闭这个窗口，转账将在后台完成。

error.notEnoughToMint: 您现在无法铸造那么多 sUSD
error.notEnoughToBurn: 您没有足够的 sUSD 来销毁。您可以在 dex 上购买更多 sUSD。

maintenance.title: Moneta 正在升级，现在暂停服务。
maintenance.subtitle: 抱歉给您带来不便，我们很快回来。

mobileLanding.title: Moneta 现在无法在手机和平板上使用。
mobileLanding.subtitle: 我们期望在接下来几个月内上线一个移动版。

tooltip.claim: 要申领奖励，您的抵押率不能低于目标抵押率超过 10%。如果您的抵押率不够，奖励领取将被关闭，直到您销毁足够的 sUSD。
tooltip.debtBalance: 一开始，您的债务等于初始铸造的 sUSD 数量，接下来，债务将随着其他合成资产持有人的收益和损失而波动。当有人持有的合成资产增值时，那部分收益将按比例来自于所有 MNA 持有人的债务。要解锁所有您抵押的 MNA，您需要首先还清您的债务。
tooltip.synthsBalance: Synth 是在 Moneta 的系统中的合成资产，包括 sUSD, sBTC, iBTC, 和所有其他在 moneta 的合成资产。这个数字是此钱包中所有合成资产的价值总和。如果您希望把它们换回 sUSD，请点击交易按钮。
tooltip.track: <0>Issued debt:</0> This displays the total of all your mints and burns over time, revealing how only your C-Ratio management has affected your debt.<1 /><2>Actual debt:</2> This displays your total debt over time.
tooltip.poolCompleted: This incentive is now completed. Please collect any rewards accrued and withdraw your tokens.
